I loved this game. The setting is BEAUTIFUL, the combats are well acomplished and the weapons complement between them pretty good. I had fun using the different powers you get.

The story for me wasn't as good as the previous games. I was specially dissapointed in the end. But that's just my opinion.

Overall I believe this is a game worthwhile being played.
写评测只是为了声明主权！伊丽莎白是我的！！

他是一款华丽的游戏，更像一个艺术品，首次接触这个系列的游戏，第一次见到无限是在网吧，
天空之城哥伦比亚给了我很大的震撼，原来游戏还能这样！！！我一直记忆犹新，看到打折就入
了，一开始对剧情一知半解，有些不明觉厉那种感觉，但是在游戏中打的很爽，渐渐地了解了剧
情的大概，也让我更加入迷。
一周目草草的过了，期待二周目加大难度。
Masterpiece. Simple as that.

Nada a declarar, apenas joguem...
Para mim o melhor jogo da série Bioshock, fechou com chave de ouro.
OBS: joguem as expansões!

Одна из лучших игр в 2010+ годах. Потрясающийся визуальный ряд, интересный геймплей, выдающаяся история. Очень жаль, что руки да Infinite у меня дошли лишь в 2016-ом году. Такие игры попадются очень редко. 20 часов наслаждения, превосходная работа. 10/10.
Великолепная игра с необычным сюжетом, отличной атмосферой и запоминающимися персонажами. Настоятельно рекомендую к приобретению!

A veritable cornucopia of talent flows when a Bioshock game is released, and this final Bioshock is no exception. Although some fans may suggest the ending was 'underwhelming', as an initiate into Bioshock, beginning my journey at the end was a smashing success with Bioshock Infinite. A first person shooter game set in an alternative universe filled with alternate universes. This Bioshock promises a JJ Abrams 'Fringe' feeling of causes and consequences. You do not have to be a fan from the Bioshock 1 to love this franchise; in fact, i'm set to purchase the rest of the trilogy and have started on the first one.

This Bioshock links the previous installments and ties it up in a bow. Set in fictional floating city of Columbia, where all our futuristic fantasies of flying zeppelins as modes of transports take an even better turn with a floating building. You follow Booker De Witt, who unlike the previous installments, is independant and makes his own choices. A debt to be repaid and the honour behind it, Booker finds himself entwined in Bioshock's classic motifs of fanatism taken too far. Religious fundamentalism and its consequences surround Booker and Elizabeth, and the pair set out to find their own way and free themselves from tyranny. Along the way, action, sci-fi and emotional air-hook rides toss you into different realities where science is bent in 10 different ways.

The plot thickens like gravy, and just when you think you understand what you must do, the story turns a whole different way. Granted, the ending is a bit hard to comprehend, and there are moments when you think 'hold on, thats impossible', believe it, because you want it to be.

Gameplay is FPS, which means sometimes its hard to defend yourself on the hardest difficulty, and i still cannot get past 1998 mode and constantly having to restart checkpoints. Plasmids are fascinating and as always the classic favourite elements; fire, electricity and water make their repeat appearances in your strange abilities.

Apart from having to amp up your skill in FPS, there hardly feels to be a complaint in gameplay, aside from the impossible feats. The DLCs KILLED IT. Connecting Bioshock 1 to Infinite in a BEAUTIful arc, where you realise things are not as they seem and are exactly what they look. Your return to Rapture is a stunning moment for loyal fans and for newcomers like myself, a masterpiece of a new area underwater.

I would vehemently recommend playing this game through and its DLCs, 3 times till you get all the achievements, because it is an emotional and psychological thrill to ride.
I fall in love to a character that doesn't exist in the real world      ;-;
An amazing narrative with fantastic gameplay that I wish I could pay again for the first time.

Es imposible no pasarse como 15 minutos contemplando los pechos de Elizabeth.
10/10 IGN

Não é sandbox (não é um defeito, é só pra acabr com a dúvida que muita gente tem e inclusive eu tive antes de jogar e não achei em site nenhum um artigo sequer que respondesse a essa questão, nem mesmo pesquisando em inglês) e o final é esquisito demais, mas o jogo é bom pra caramba, embora curto, o cenário é lindo (os gráficos também, para um jogo de mar/2013 que acabam superando até mesmoos gráficos de alguns jogos atuais), os reflexos e as partículas são perfeitos, o jogo está muito bem otimizado (roda no ultra com minha Zotac Geforce GTX 970 Amp! Extreme Core Edition SLI de 100, 110 frames por segundo, nas partes mais pesadas, pra mais) a jogabilidade é muito boa, comigo só aconteceu uma vez um bug da Elizabeth não conseguir destrancar uma porta porque eu tava na frente hehe. A variedade de armas não é enorme como a de GTA e Saints Row mas tem o necessário e o suficiente para um jogo não muito grande como esse: RPG, carabina, fuzil de precisão, etc. No total são 8 poderes mas eu acabei não usando todos eles. O game pelo que parece pulou uma párte de uma missão pra mim só porque eu morria muito e a cada 30 segundos e eu fiquei meio chateado porque era uma missão bem bacana. O jogo pode dar uma "queda de FPS" quando tá salvando automaticamente ou renderizando uma nova parte do mapa após entrar em algum lugar, etc, independentemente do quão boa sua máquina é .Mas enfim, o game serve de exemplo pros próximos games FPS que devem vir e também para amornar o fracasso do BioShock 2. Recomendo bastante. Nota final: 90/10.

Por mais incrível que pareça, Bioshock Infinite consegue ser ainda melhor que o 1º. 
História, gráficos, trilha sonora, jogabilidade, tudo ótimo! Jogão 10/10.
Masterpiece, I have nothing more to say...
如果我提前知道了结局，那我一定不会打断你在沙滩上的那只舞蹈。
It's a miracle that a campaign this one-note is still really compelling.  Great writing, compelling performances, and it still has the greatest ending seen in gaming.
bay,伊丽莎白。

[h1]以艺术之名	[/h1]
 [quote=Oracle] “带给我们那个女孩，你的债务一笔勾销。”布克·德维特打开盒子，里面是一个手枪、一张照片、一把钥匙，狂风暴雨中一座灯塔的轮廓依稀可见。布克爬上木质码头，朝灯塔走去，一个男人，一座灯塔，一个城市。总是如此。[/quote]
      我对这款游戏最初的认识来自于13年六月份的杂质《大众软件》，期刊中用了一个专题《无限的世界，无限的天空》来描述这款游戏的剧情、细节以及主要制作人肯·列文幕后的故事。当初我对游戏中穿插的故事并没有很多的认识，当看到文章以大量的篇幅讲解游戏的剧情时，我甚至以为我在看的是一篇电影的影评。直到假期有了时间来玩这款游戏，我才意识到原来游戏也可以将一个故事讲得如此完美，这款游戏也成为了我心目中的第一个游戏类艺术品。
—————————————————————————————————————————————————
以上是题外话，下面正经地评价下这款游戏。
+优美的音乐
+更优美的景色
+更更优美的故事
+更更更优美的伊丽莎白
             10/10

Awesome Game With Rich A Story

10/10

This game loses the loli waifus from previous games and the robot waifu from the second.  Instead you get a pretty good waifu who's with you throughout most of the game.  Her name is Carol or Kate or something I can't remember.  But I really enjoyed her being my waifu and throwing me ammo and stuff.

Although I love the series as a whole and love Rapture, My Favourite game of all time, loved the look, the feel, the story, and the dlc, definatley felt connected with Elizabeth as though I was Booker. They did a great job with her character and A.I. 
Many years from now. When i'm old and grey and the machines have taken over, I will look back on this game with Nostalgia before jamming a pipe bomb into Arnold Schwarzenegger. 10/10

This game really succeeds in creating an emotional connection with the player. The story is superb. Courtnee Draper's and Troy Baker's acting really cover the character's, making one feel invested in their story. 
The only negative I can get out of this game is that occasionally the combat can be a bit of a grind. The story and the rest of the game really make up for it, however.
Despite the combat I would give this game a 9.5 out of 10

Excelente juego, con un estilo de arte unico, recomendable para los seguidores de la saga y tambien para aquellos que no hayan jugado los anteriores ya que no es necesario conocerlos para comprender la historia de este.

断断续续地玩了快一年，终于打通了主线，最初接触BioShock来源一本讲游戏设计的书，该书的作者是生化奇兵无限之城的一名策划。后面听彭帅推荐，一口气买了3部曲+所有DLC，目前只玩了画面最好，时间线最早的第三部。整体剧情还算中规中矩，反乌托邦也一直是我的菜。但叙事手法，气氛营造非常赞，简直是电影式体验。每当看到那些复古海报，留声机，故意做旧的黑白影片，大气的雕像，精美的油画时，心中都在感叹，他们美术真牛，开发组真舍得砸钱。玩了很久后才听说本作开发时间长达6年，虽然产品出来时评价很高，销量也很好，但是由于开发成本过高还是亏了，最后导致工作室解散...有些可惜，决定回头再看看那本书。
Super hra.
Damn....That game is sooooooo good. The story, guns, gameplay, powers. All perfection......
The greatest thing created in the history of anything ever.

Un buenisimo transfondo, muy buena historia y gameplay si buscas un juego entretenido para enfoctarte bien en su historia y repetirlo unas cuantas veces sin que te de alguna molestia este es tu juego.

La jugabilidad es buena pero despues de un largo periodo te puede cansar, te recomiendo que si buscas un juego shooter este podria no podria ser viendo mas en el mercado que te brindaria un juego enfocado a pegar tiros.
La historia a mi parecer no es comprensible para jugarlo una sola ves tendrias que jugarlo varias veces para entenderlo.

La jugabilidad es buena, si buscas una convinacion de shooter con fantasia como las anteriores entregas y si no has jugado las anteriores, te recomiendo inciar desde el primer bioshock (no el remaster por el momento), ya para que puedas tener toda la experencia completa que de brindara este bioshock.
生化奇兵的最终篇，故事叙事模式是游戏界的新高度，充满奇幻色彩的艺术设定，布克和伊丽莎白的冒险之旅跌宕起伏，时空穿梭成为这个游戏的一大特色，结局十分发人深省，非常建议同时购买海葬dlc，与一代相连接，为销魂城之旅画上完美的句号。
The battles are freaking chaos.  I just turned the difficulty down to zero and spammed attacks from a corner until they were over just to try and see the end of the story.  Not fun at all.
出人意料的结局，经典之作，值得一玩

The plot was boring for the first five hours and ridiculous for the last five.  Since the game apparently wasn't but 9.6 hours total, there's some overlap there.

Gameplay was functional, but not interesting.
Кратко:все руки не доходили доиграть,думаю сейчас доиграю ! Не знаю кому как , я шутером "Bioshock" не считаю хотя этого хватает вполне.Поиграете поймете , а игра очень понравилась . рекомендую !

First off, if you have any interest in a steampunk styled setting, buy this game, no question. It hits every mark for the classical sci-fi of the early 20th century, and it does it beautifully at that. With that being said, it's a Bioshock game, so be ready to get creeped out, absolutely mind-f*cked, all the while trying to shoot people in the face while blasting them with... magic? Salts. Yes, this game has a lot of salt. But anyway!

Pros:
- Beautiful graphics, giant floating cities never looked so pretty.
- Storyline is intense, appropriately confusing and complex, mind-boggling, and very well paced. The ending is quite amazing too tying all of the brain-f*cking together and laying out in great detail the components of the plot, ending most of the loose ends in the story.
- Gunplay is great, but will touch on that a bit later.
- Atmosphere-wise, amazing as expected from a Bioshock game. The sound design is awesome, appropriately creepy when supernatural sh*t goes down, and the harsh lighting effects in the game's various environments contribute to the extra evil creepiness that is going on in the city.
- The lore is amazing, and will have you properly pissed at various social issues from the 20th century that are replicated in the city of Columbia. The universe feels real, and there is legitimate empathy for some of the poor souls in the city that have been castrated by the dystopia.


Cons:
- Too much shooting, not enough magic. Vigors are rather underwhelming, and combined with the lackluster assortment of guns (of which you can only carry 2 at a time), combat is rather repetitive and uninteresting compared to the in-game technical accomplishments of the city. While again, the guns do feel nice and punchy, in the end it's just another headshot for another kill, nothing too fancy.

I would recommend this game to anyone that loves a good story and some solid FPS gameplay, but I would recommend to get it on sale. The reason for that is this game is rather short. I completed it in 9 hours, spending a good amount of time searching for secrets and extras. On top of that, the game has very little replay value aside from experiencing the plot a second time around.

Coloquei no hard achando que ia me dar bem, com esse fdp desse jogo, não aguentei 10 minutos de por.rada com ele já tava querendo desistir, fui masoquista e zerei depois de passar muito ódio e raiva sair gritando e xingando tudo e todos com umas situações beirando o rídiculo esse jogo vai te deixar 999% modo turbo concerteza! E ainda tem um plot twist no final que vai te deixar tipo WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH Te forçando a rejogar ou indo procurar teorias de outras pessoas pra entender exatamente o que aconteceu e é realmente uma bagulho do tipo "CAR.ALHO VIA.DO".

Holy crabs! I. LOVE. THIS. GAME. This is my FAVORITE BioShock out there! I love the 1st and 2nd one, but with BioShock Infinite, from graphics to voice-acting to gameplay to story telling, this game is top-notch! It takes place in the floating city of Columbia in the year 1912. I love how you can ride the sky-line and jump down to kick the enemy off the platform! I finished this game the day I wrote this review. The story is amazing! It may be a tad bit confusing towards the end, but once you do your research on what really happened in the game and what was going on, it makes so much sense that if/when you go back and play it towards the end again, you will say, "Wow, what a story!" By all means buy this game if you haven't all ready (if you have played the previous BioShocks that is).

Ambientazione stupenda, gameplay semplice, ma ben studiato, grafica pulita e bella alla vista e una trama appassionante.L'unico problema(sopratutto per i fan dei capitoli precedenti) è il fatto che il  vigor non si rigenera senza ausilio di pozioni.
Tiene una historia genial con unos giros argumentales muy bien hechos y un exelente final para la saga bioshock, tambien esta muy bien optimizado para computadoras poco potentes como la mia XD

Overall this is an adorable game, in all aspects and you should definitely play it.

I didn't really appreciate the story though.
[spoiler] The whole "you were the villain the whole time" trope is getting old in my opinion. I'd prefer something more original, or even an actual villain. That would be fine too. Also, games that mess with time travel usually end up using the same cliches. This one came pretty close to becoming a huge cliche itself.  [/spoiler]
Other than that, i liked the mechanics, i liked columbia and i liked the enemies. 
The optional side quests were also very cute.
What was really missing from this game was a f<3<3<3ing map though. Especially when you're jumping from one building to another in order to complete the side quests, it's very easy to get lost since the arrow only points towards the main quest. 
In my opinion, Bioshock 1 is still the best out there.

The first time I saw Columbia I was like "wow..!". Infinite is a really beautiful game with an intriguing story and colorful characters.

I highly recommend it!

At least the graphics are good.

Beatiful graphics, even for 2016 standards. Fantastic story, a bit like watching a movie where you are involved. The amount of combat is well balanced and never gets to a point where its grinding.

这游戏是个艺术品，无论从画面、配乐、剧情或是细节足可以称得上是满分的作品。当然最出彩的是伊丽莎白，她是所有FPS游戏中最完美的队友，在你最关键的时刻给你补给；自己寻找掩体，让你放心的和敌人去拼杀；进入场景的时候会自己去探索，和你互动，而不是傻傻的跟在你后面。她让玩家不再孤单，不会感觉是一个人在玩游戏，给玩家完美的体验。

Nice game. My only complain is that there's no inverntory. So I can't carry any health kit. You'll only find the health kits/food to replenish your health after you're done with the enemies and are free to explore around, which is kinda useless if you need to replenish your health DURING combat. In addition, the amount of food is insane once you've found them. It'll be much better with inventory, then these food/health kits won't go to waste. Other than that, this game is pretty awesome.

EDIT: Another thing... Why can't the game be saved manually??

Игра великолепна! Я её прохожу уже на хардкоре. И всё  не так сложно как я ожидал,скажу я вам! Сейчас на последнем задании. Ачивки тоже понятныеи не сложные. Они добовляют этой игре тоже немного интереса. Теперь хочу взять Season Pass со всеми дополнениями. Брал по акции,но если бы знал что эта игра такая великолепная,то не пожалел бы полной суммы на поеупку этой игры)))  Вот мои оценки:

Управление: 9 из 10.
Сюжет: 9 из 10.
Музыкальное сопровождение: 10 из 10.
Экшен: 10 из 10.
Ну и наконец,Эллизабет: 50 из 10))))))) Все советую к покупке! Удачи!

완벽이라는 단어가 어색하지 않은 게임
결국 데이트는 걷다 먹다 걷다 먹다 하는겁니다

번역문제가 있는데 1999모드 자판기 안쓰고 클리어하기 도전과제 깨실때
달러빌(탄약, 의료킷, 이브주사 판매하는 자판기)만 안쓰시면 됩다
비거자판기랑 아머 강화기는 사용하셔도 되요
달러빌 안쓰고 클리어를 자판기 안쓰고 클리어라고 적어놨어....
"Story rich"
